title: Emerson MWG1191SB Countertop Microwave Oven with 1100W Grill Function, Sleek Mirrored Finish 10 Power Levels, 6 Auto Menus, Glass Turntable and Child Safe Lock, 1.1 Cu. Ft, Stainless Steel
description: Cook meals in minutes with the sleek, stylish Emerson countertop microwave with 1100W grill that allows you more versatility with your microwave! This powerful Emerson microwave makes cooking quick and convenient. The 1100 watts of power heat up meals in minutes, while the roomy 1.1 cubic foot interior fits large plates with ease. The intuitive controls include 10 power levels, 1 pure grill power level, 2 combo power levels and 6 auto menus. This microwave also includes a 99-minute timer for customized cooking. The sleek black cabinet and mirrored door add style to your countertop. Best of all, the child lock keeps little hands safe. Perfect for busy families, college students, and anyone who wants delicious meals fast, the Emerson MWG1191SB microwave streamlines cooking and adds modern style to your kitchen.
